summary:
Play as a dragon, become dragon.
You can fly now.
descriptionHtml:
WereDragon v0.1.9 quick update
By Hayk94

This is just a quick update which fixes the bug with the lowering ring when the player will go back to its previous height after unequipping the ring.
Just unrar the WDBeta0.1.9 into your Skyrim game directory.


Weredragon Beta v0.1.8

1.Description
2.Installation
3.How to fly
4.Changelog
5.Future plans
6.Credits

1.Description
This mod lets you to become a dragon and fly. Though there are some issues yet(Read how to fly section).But I have teamed up with ElSte17 and we are working hard on making the flight perfect.
IF YOU LIKE THIS MOD PLEASE ENDORSE\\VOTE IT.

2.Installation
Unrar the WDbeta archive into your skyrim data folder.

3.How to fly
Controling the flight is done with rings right now(buttons will be assinged when SKSE for CK is released).
Run and load your game, open console type 
help \"wd flying\"
and console will return you 3 forms.
Then type
player.additem (FormIDs returned by console) 1
Now you have 3 new rings in your inventory one for going high, one for going lower and one for stopping the flight completly.
Then type player.setrace dragon or player.setrace wdragonrace4. The latter is a new dragon.
ONE IMPORTANT THING TO DO - If you are on the ground yet and want to take off use the ring for going higher.Equip it dragon will go higher though there won\'t be animations. THEN GO TO 1ST PERSON AND UNEQUIP THE RING. Back to 3rd person.Have a happy flight.

4.Changelog
3 new rings to control the flight
3 new scripts for them
New unique playable dragon SOS KRIID IN.

5.Future plans
Make the flight perfect
Create new shouts to turn into different dragons.
A quest to get them.
Some more new unique dragons.

6.Credits
Hayk94
ElSte17
And special thanks to 26183 for textures of the new dragons.


IF YOU LIKE THIS MOD PLEASE ENDORSE\\VOTE IT.
author: Hayk94

files.name: WeredragonOLD
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the torso issue.
Do not replaces werewolf anymore.
Added ability to shout
Alduin is not playable.

files.name: Weredragon Flying Alpha3
files.changelogHtml:
Grey screen is fixed.
Dragon now succesfully begins the flight without any game crash and grey screen. To begin to fly hit the spacebar.
However there is just a litlle issue, while in air the dragon just freezes you can shout turn your mouse but it doesn\'t go forward.I\'m working on this to fix as soon as possible.
Also now you can succesfully hover and land but no controls assinged to these yet. So use the console commands \"Player.pa 0003b4e4\" to land and \"Player.pa 0003b4e5\" to hover, \"Player.pa 0003b4e6\" to fly again.
And now you can bite with your dovah, with left mouse button and hit with tail on the ground with right mouse button.

files.name: Weredragon Flying Alpha4
files.changelogHtml: Some people had problems with saves, and fast travels since 0.0.6 this wiil fix that.
